title: The 10 best cycling deals on Amazon’s Prime Day 2023
content:

The 10 best cycling deals on Amazon’s Prime Day 2023

Over the next two days, 11th and 12th July 2023, Amazon is knocking huge chunks off the prices of loads of its stuff exclusively for its Prime customers. It’s an endeavour to encourage people to sign up but it’s also an opportunity to bag some excellent deals on an array of stuff, including plenty for cyclists.

We’ve trawled the website for the best stuff for you to bargain hunt some upgrades to your kit list, whether you’re already a Prime customer or as an excuse to sign up and cancel as soon as possible.

If we haven’t located what you are looking for, you can see even more Amazon Cycling Deals here.

1. Garmin Edge 530 Performance GPS Bike Computer

Includes routable Garmin Cycle Map with popularity routing, meaning you can ride like a local wherever you go.
Cycling safety features include new bike alarm, group messaging and tracking, incident detection and compatibility with Varia rearview radar and lights so you can see and be seen.

  • RRP: £259.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £179.99

2. Wahoo Elemnt Bolt GPS Bike Computer

Become the Local Legend in your favorite riding spots. When Strava is authenticated in the ELEMNT Companion App, ELEMNT ROAM will alert you when your saved Strava Segments are approaching on your route to give you real-time progress and you race for the KOM/QOM.

  • RRP: £199.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £162.54

3. Garmin Varia RTL515 Rearview Radar and Tail Light

Rearview radar with tail light provides awareness of vehicles approaching from behind up to 140 metres away. When used with your compatible smartphone, the Varia app provides graphics — plus tone and vibration alerts — that indicate approaching cars

  • RRP: £169.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £139.99

4. POC Omne Air MIPS Bike Helmet

COMMUTING AND ROAD_ All-purpose bike helmet offers all-round protection for everyday use. Multi-use helmet is ideal for all kinds of road cycling, from weekend club rides to daily commutes.

  • RRP: £180.75
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £95.98

5. Garmin HRM-Dual Heart Rate Monitor

Adjustable and comfortable premium heart rate chest strap made of soft material with removable heart rate module.
Battery life of approx. 3.5 years (with average use of 1 hour per day)

  • RRP: £59.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £44.99

6. Gore Spirit Cycling Jacket

Versatile men’s cycling jacket, Ideal for all weather conditions. Regular Fit for comfortable freedom of movement, Cycling-specific cut, Reflective details

  • RRP: £149.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £71.25

7. Awang 5-25Nm Torque Wrench Set

Premium Material – The 1/4 torque wrench is made of Cr-V, which is strong and durable. It provides 5-25NM of torque for greater precision when tightening screws or bolts.

  • RRP: £43.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £28.79

8. Panaracer Gravelking SK TLC Folding Tyre

The GravelKing SK series features tread blocks specifically designed to generate peak performance on gravel and loose roads. Tubeless compatible (up to 60psi).

  • RRP: £39.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £29.99

9. KMC X11SL 11 Speed Chain

11 Speed Chain. 1/2 inch x 11/128 inch, 118 links. Silver.

  • RRP: £44.99
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £35.49

10. Vavert 700×18-25c Road Bike Inner Tubes (Pack of 5)

High quality and robust inner tubes from Vavert. Will fit widths from 18 to 25c. Presta valve.
Sold as a set of 5 tubes.

  • RRP: £14.69
  • Buy it today from Amazon for £10.99
